result.execSummary:
The defendant Dale R. Delaney was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Retail Theft - Intentionally Take (<=$500) [Modifiers: Repeater], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.50(1m)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

superMiscConds.notes:
Obey all of the rules and regulations of supervising probation agent.  Pay supervision fees. 
**   Pay all court costs including all applicable surcharges.  Submit a DNA sample (unless previously provided).
** Pay DNA surcharges.   If unpaid financial obligations remain at discharge or revocation, civil judgment to be entered. Cooperate with the Child Support Agency to pay child support and make all court appearances.  DOC shall promptly notify the court, in writing, of any new arrest or criminal charge made against the deft.

11/23/15 - Sentencing Hearing
Conditions of Probation Imposed by the Judge
JOC WAS PRINTED TWICE FOR NO REASON.

Minutes:  15CF679/15CF837/15CM1007.  Clerk/T. Lehman.  ADA Krejcarek appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in custody w/Atty Angela Komp.  Sentencing arguments made.  

15CM1007 - deft sentenced to 2yrs WSP; initial confinement of 1yr followed by 1yr of ES.  See conditions.  Credit for 83 days.

15CF679 - sentence w/held; placed on probation for 9mos consecutive to 15CM1007.  See conditions

15CF837 - sentence w/held; placed on probation for 3yrs consecutive to 15CM1007 but concurrent to 15CF679.  See conditions.

Appeal rights
Firearm warning
Voting acknowledgment.
DNA ordered; notice given to deft

Minutes:  15CF679/15CF837/15CM1007.  Clerk/T. Lehman.  ADA Krejcarek appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in custody w/Atty Angela Komp.  Cases are resolved.  Victim rights compliance.

15CF679 - deft pleads guilty to count 1; found guilty by the Court.  Count 2 is dismissed & read-in on State's motion.

15CF837 - deft pleads guilty to count 2; found guilty by the Court.  Counts 1 & 3 are dismissed & read-in on State's motion.

15CM1007 - deft pleads guilty; found guilty by the Court.  Admits to repeater.

PSI ordered.  Sentencing set for 11/23/15 @ 3pm.
No disposition. Leave on for next scheduled court activity.
